/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Bare trees, devoid of leaves, stand tall on either side of the street, their branches reaching out towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows on the ground and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
